chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product iPhone 13 mini has the above problem.

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare, 

We have contacted our logistics partner about the cancellation of the order. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you. 

Regards, 
TB
I don't want to cancel. I want to have the device! Thank you!

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the customer's request, we will arrange accordingly.

Regards,
JY

Hello ecomobile,

Did you send it?

After you send it, can you share TN with us?

Regards,
Aysah, Back market

Dear Backcare,

We have shipped out the device to the customer.

Here is the tracking number: 1ZBF1560D901219491

Please note that as the courier has just picked up the parcel, it might take a while before it is accurately displayed on their website.

In the meantime please do not refund.

If you initiate a refund while the product is being shipped, we will lodge a case with SSC.

Regards,
HB

Dear Backcare,

According to the tracking link, the parcel has been delivered to the collection point on 12th June. Kindly ask the customer to go pick up their parcel. And if the customer requires no further assistance, kindly close the case. Thank you.

Regards,
JY
